pi_variance.interpretation: π variance not confirmed; both case types behave identically at current sample size.

warnings: Small corpus (26 opinions) limits transformer diversity and inflates effect sizes.

notes: Narrative quality shows strong positive correlation with forward citations despite limited sample.
Agency (Δ) reflects moderate leverage of narrative within an evidence-weighted system (π≈0.52).
Need more cleaned cases to reach requested n=1000 and stabilize cluster validation.
Split vs unanimous π variance not observed yet; evidence decomposition suggests split cases still use higher narrative quality.
